mapper.select: SELECT send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id ORDER BY sendDate desc
SELECT * FROM c_send WHERE endkm IS NULL OR endkm=''

SELECT t1.*, t2.department_id, t2.department_name FROM c_send t1 LEFT JOIN department t2 ON t1.department_id = t2.department_id
WHERE (endkm IS NULL OR endkm='') AND (t1.department_id =#{id} OR t2.fatherdep=#{id})

SELECT send_id, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, SUM(endkm-firstkm) AS kkk1, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_send LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(sendDate,'%Y')=#{0} AND DATE_FORMAT(sendDate,'%c')=#{1} GROUP BY department.department_id

SELECT c1.car_id,c1.carnumber,c1.usenature,IFNULL(c2.kkk,0) AS kkk1,c2.send_id,c1.department_id FROM c_register c1 LEFT JOIN( SELECT send_id, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, SUM(endkm-firstkm) AS kkk, c_send.car_id, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_send LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id WHERE (c_send.department_id = #{0} OR department.fatherdep=#{1}) AND DATE_FORMAT(sendDate,'%Y')=#{2} GROUP BY c_send.car_id) c2 ON c1.car_id = c2.car_id WHERE (c1.department_id = #{3}) GROUP BY c1.car_id

SELECT c1.drvierName, c1.department_id,c1.driver_id,c2.kkk AS kkk1,c2.send_id,c2.sendDate FROM c_driver c1 LEFT JOIN(SELECT send_id, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, SUM(endkm-firstkm) AS kkk, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id WHERE (c_send.department_id =#{0} OR department.fatherdep=#{1}) AND DATE_FORMAT(sendDate,'%Y')=#{2} GROUP BY c_send.driver_id) c2 ON c1.driver_id = c2.driver_id WHERE c1.department_id = #{3} GROUP BY c1.driver_id

select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id where c_send.department_id = #{departmentId} ORDER BY sendDate desc

select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id where (c_send.department_id = #{0} or department.fatherdep=#{1}) ORDER BY sendDate desc

SELECT send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE send_id = #{sendId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM c_send WHERE send_id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE c_register.car_id =#{carId} ORDER BY sendDate desc

select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE c_register.carnumber LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{sendnums},'%' ) ORDER BY sendDate desc

select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE c_apply.bianhao LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{bianh},'%')

select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE c_driver.drviername LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{drivername},'%' ) ORDER BY sendDate desc

select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE (department.department_id = #{0} or department.fatherdep=#{1} ) and c_register.carnumber LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{2},'%' ) ORDER BY sendDate desc

select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE (department.department_id = #{0} or department.fatherdep=#{1} ) and c_apply.bianhao LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{2},'%' ) ORDER BY sendDate desc

select send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, sdate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, c_send.note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, c_send.notes, c_apply.apply_id, c_apply.bianhao, c_register.car_id, c_register.useNature, c_register.carnumber, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name, c_driver.driver_id, c_driver.drviername FROM c_send LEFT JOIN c_apply ON c_send.apply_id = c_apply.apply_id LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_send.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_send.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_send.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE (department.department_id = #{0} or department.fatherdep=#{1} ) and c_driver.drviername LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{2},'%' ) ORDER BY sendDate desc
mapper.sql: send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, notes, apply_id, sdate, department_id, car_id, driver_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from c_send
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into c_send (send_id, sendNums, sendUser, road, userCarPeople, sendDate, endCarDate, firstDuty, safe, note, firstkm, endkm, tianqi, chucheq, xingshiz, shoucheh, shigujl, notes, apply_id, sdate, department_id, car_id, driver_id) values (#{sendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendnums,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{road,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercarpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endcardate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstduty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tianqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chucheq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xingshiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoucheh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shigujl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update c_send
send_id = #{record.sendId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sendNums = #{record.sendnums,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sendUser = #{record.senduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
road = #{record.road,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userCarPeople = #{record.usercarpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sendDate = #{record.senddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endCarDate = #{record.endcardate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
firstDuty = #{record.firstduty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safe = #{record.safe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firstkm = #{record.firstkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endkm = #{record.endkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tianqi = #{record.tianqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chucheq = #{record.chucheq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xingshiz = #{record.xingshiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shoucheh = #{record.shoucheh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shigujl = #{record.shigujl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_id = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sdate = #{record.sdate,jdbcType=DATE},
department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{record.carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
driver_id = #{record.driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update c_send set send_id = #{record.sendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sendNums = #{record.sendnums,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendUser = #{record.senduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, road = #{record.road,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userCarPeople = #{record.usercarpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendDate = #{record.senddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endCarDate = #{record.endcardate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, firstDuty = #{record.firstduty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safe = #{record.safe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firstkm = #{record.firstkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endkm = #{record.endkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tianqi = #{record.tianqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chucheq = #{record.chucheq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingshiz = #{record.xingshiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shoucheh = #{record.shoucheh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shigujl = #{record.shigujl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_id = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sdate = #{record.sdate,jdbcType=DATE}, department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{record.carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, driver_id = #{record.driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_send
sendNums = #{sendnums,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sendUser = #{senduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
road = #{road,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userCarPeople = #{usercarpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sendDate = #{senddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endCarDate = #{endcardate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
firstDuty = #{firstduty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safe = #{safe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firstkm = #{firstkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endkm = #{endkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tianqi = #{tianqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chucheq = #{chucheq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xingshiz = #{xingshiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shoucheh = #{shoucheh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shigujl = #{shigujl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sdate = #{sdate,jdbcType=DATE},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where send_id = #{sendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_send set sendNums = #{sendnums,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendUser = #{senduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, road = #{road,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userCarPeople = #{usercarpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendDate = #{senddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endCarDate = #{endcardate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, firstDuty = #{firstduty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safe = #{safe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firstkm = #{firstkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endkm = #{endkm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tianqi = #{tianqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chucheq = #{chucheq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingshiz = #{xingshiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shoucheh = #{shoucheh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shigujl = #{shigujl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sdate = #{sdate,jdbcType=DATE}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where send_id = #{sendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
